title: Founding of the Tang Dynasty
description: The Tang Dynasty was founded by Li Yuan in 618 AD.

title: Xuanzang's Pilgrimage to India
description: Xuanzang embarked on a pilgrimage to India along the Silk Road to study Buddhism.

title: Empress Wu Zetian's Reign
description: Wu Zetian declared herself the Emperor of China, ruling as the only female emperor.

title: An Lushan Rebellion
description: A major rebellion led by An Lushan against the Tang Dynasty.

title: Fall of the Tang Dynasty
description: The Tang Dynasty came to an end, leading to the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

title: Founding of the Song Dynasty
description: The Song Dynasty was established by Emperor Taizu in 960 AD.

title: Conquest of the Song Dynasty by Kublai Khan
description: Kublai Khan conquered the Song Dynasty, founding the Yuan Dynasty.
